verses.verse: Take heed that<WG4337> ye do<WG4160> not<WG3361> your<WG5216> righteousness<WG1654> before<WG1715> men<WG444>, to<WG4314> be seen<WG2300> of them<WG1487>: else<WG1161> ye have<WG2192> no<WG3361> reward<WG3408> with<WG3844> your<WG5216> Father<WG3962> who is<WG3588> in<WG1722> heaven<WG3772>.

that <WG3704> thine<WG4675> alms<WG1654> may be<WG5600> in<WG1722> secret<WG2927>: and<WG2532> thy<WG4675> Father<WG3962> who seeth<WG991> in<WG1722> secret<WG2927> shall recompense<WG591> thee<WG4671>.

But <WG1161> thou<WG4771>, when<WG3752> thou prayest<WG4336>, enter<WG1525> into<WG1519> thine inner chamber<WG2532>, and having shut<WG2808> thy<WG4675> door<WG2374>, pray<WG4336> to<WG3962> thy<WG4675> Father<WG3962> who is<WG3588> in<WG1722> secret<WG2927>, and<WG2532> thy<WG4675> Father<WG3962> who seeth<WG991> in<WG1722> secret<WG2927> shall recompense<WG591> thee<WG4671>.

Be <WG3666> not<WG3361> therefore<WG3767> like<WG3666> unto them<WG846>: for<WG1063> your<WG5216> Father<WG3962> knoweth<WG1492> what things<WG3739> ye have<WG2192> need of<WG5532>, before<WG4253> ye<WG5209> ask<WG154> him<WG846>.
After this manner<WG3779> therefore<WG3767> pray<WG4336> ye<WG5210>. Our<WG2257> Father<WG3962> who art<WG3588> in<WG1722> heaven<WG3772>, Hallowed be<WG37> thy<WG4675> name<WG3686>.

And <WG2532> forgive<WG863> us<WG2254> our<WG2257> debts<WG3783>, as<WG5613> we<WG2249> also have<WG2532> forgiven<WG863> our<WG2257> debtors<WG3781>.
And <WG2532> bring us<WG2248> not<WG3361> into<WG1519> temptation<WG3986>, but<WG235> deliver<WG4506> us<WG2248> from<WG575> the evil one<WG4190>.

But <WG1161> thou<WG4771>, when thou fastest<WG3522>, anoint<WG218> thy<WG4675> head<WG2776>, and<WG2532> wash<WG3538> thy<WG4675> face<WG4383>;

that <WG3704> thou be not<WG3361> seen<WG5316> of men<WG444> to fast<WG3522>, but<WG235> of thy<WG4675> Father<WG3962> who is<WG3588> in<WG1722> secret<WG2927>: and<WG2532> thy<WG4675> Father<WG3962>, who seeth<WG991> in<WG1722> secret<WG2927>, shall recompense<WG591> thee<WG4671>.

Lay <WG2343> not<WG3361> up<WG2343> for yourselves<WG5213> treasures<WG2344> upon<WG1909> the earth<WG1093>, where<WG3699> moth<WG4597> and<WG2532> rust<WG1035> consume<WG853>, and<WG2532> where<WG3699> thieves<WG2812> break through<WG1358> and<WG2532> steal<WG2813>:

but <WG1161> lay up<WG2343> for yourselves<WG5213> treasures<WG2344> in<WG1722> heaven<WG3772>, where<WG3699> neither<WG3777> moth<WG4597> nor<WG3777> rust<WG1035> doth consume<WG853>, and<WG2532> where<WG3699> thieves<WG2812> do<WG1358> not<WG3756> break through<WG1358> nor<WG3761> steal<WG2813>:
for <WG1063> where<WG3699> thy<WG5216> treasure<WG2344> is<WG2076>, there<WG1563> will<WG2071> thy<WG5216> heart<WG2588> be<WG2071> also<WG2532>.

The lamp<WG3088> of the body<WG4983> is<WG2076> the eye<WG3788>: if<WG1437> therefore<WG3767> thine<WG4675> eye<WG3788> be<WG5600> single<WG573>, thy<WG4675> whole<WG3650> body<WG4983> shall be<WG2071> full of light<WG5460>.

But <WG1161> if<WG1437> thine<WG4675> eye<WG3788> be<WG5600> evil<WG4190>, thy<WG4675> whole<WG3650> body<WG4983> shall be<WG2071> full of darkness<WG4652>. If<WG1487> therefore<WG3767> the light<WG5457> that is<WG3588> in<WG1722> thee<WG4671> be<WG2076> darkness<WG4655>, how great<WG4214> is the darkness<WG4655>!

No man<WG3762> can<WG1410> serve<WG1398> two<WG1417> masters<WG2962>; for<WG1063> either<WG2228> he will hate<WG3404> the one<WG1520>, and<WG2532> love<WG25> the other<WG2087>; or else<WG2228> he will hold to<WG472> one<WG1520>, and<WG2532> despise<WG2706> the other<WG3756>. Therefore <WG1223> I<WG5124> say<WG3004> unto you<WG5213>, be<WG3309> not<WG3361> anxious<WG3309> for<WG5590> your<WG5216> life<WG5590>, what<WG5101> ye shall eat<WG5315>, or<WG2532> what<WG5101> ye shall drink<WG4095>; nor yet<WG3366> for<WG4983> your<WG5216> body<WG4983>, what<WG5101> ye shall put on<WG1746>. Is<WG2076> not<WG3780> the life<WG5590> more<WG4119> than the food<WG5160>, and<WG2532> the body<WG4983> than the raiment<WG1742>?

Behold <WG1689> the birds<WG4071> of the heaven<WG3772>, that<WG3754> they sow<WG4687> not<WG3756>, neither<WG3761> do they reap<WG2325>, nor<WG3761> gather<WG4863> into<WG1519> barns<WG596>; and<WG2532> your<WG5216> heavenly<WG3770> Father<WG3962> feedeth<WG5142> them<WG846>. Be <WG3309> not<WG3361> therefore<WG3767> anxious<WG3309>, saying<WG3004>, What<WG5101> shall we eat<WG5315>? or<WG2228>, What<WG5101> shall we drink<WG4095>? or<WG2228>, Wherewithal<WG5101> shall we be clothed<WG4016>?

Be <WG3309> not<WG3361> therefore<WG3767> anxious<WG3309> for<WG1519> the morrow<WG839>: for<WG1063> the morrow<WG839> will be anxious<WG3309> for<WG3588> itself<WG1438>. Sufficient<WG713> unto the day<WG2250> is the evil<WG2549> thereof<WG846>.
